Entity.Description: This table stores the services supported by UPS.
Entity.Name: Carr_Service

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Key

Attribute.Description: The carrier code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service Type code.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: Description of the UPS service.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table is referred to get the carrier service and service group during tracking number generation for UPS.
Entity.Name: Carrier_Special_Service

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Special_Service_Key

Attribute.Description: The Carrier Code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service Type Code.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: UPS Service Level Indicator for bytes 9 and 10 of the UPS tracking number.
Attribute.Name: Special_Service_Group

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores UPS published zone information based on the source location.
Entity.Name: Carrier_Zone

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Zone_Key

Attribute.Description: The Carrier Code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service Type Code.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: Postal Code of the source location.
Attribute.Name: Source_Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: UPS provides destination postal codes as a range of postal codes. The lower value in the range goes here.
Attribute.Name: Dest_From_Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: UPS provides destination postal codes as a range of postal codes. The higher value in the range goes here.
Attribute.Name: Dest_To_Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: Destination country.
Attribute.Name: Dest_Country

Attribute.Description: The zone as given by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Zone

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores item level information for an international UPS shipper. So there will be one record for each item of the carton in the manifest.
Entity.Name: Commodity_Record

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Commodity_Record_Key

Attribute.Description: This has the MANIFEST_UPS_DTL_KEY of the carton (the carton to which the item belongs) in the YCS_MANIFEST_UPS_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Number

Attribute.Description: The line number associated with the commodity or invoice line as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: InvoiceLineNumber

Attribute.Description: The harmonized code representing the commodity as indicated on the commercail invoice.
Attribute.Name: Commodity_Code

Attribute.Description: The shipper's part number or reference number for the commodity as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Part_Number

Attribute.Description: The country of manufacture or production or growth of the article. Must coform to ISO/IATA country code.
Attribute.Name: Line_Origin_Country

Attribute.Description: The Currency Code for the value of the commodity contained in the invoice line as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Currency_Code

Attribute.Description: The Export Commodity Control Number for the commodity.
Attribute.Name: Eccn

Attribute.Description: The per unit value of the commodity in the invoice line as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Unit_Amt_Price

Attribute.Description: The quantity of the commodity in the invoice line as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure of the commodity in the invoice line as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Qty_Uom

Attribute.Description: The validated export license number for the commodity contained in the shipment, as indicated on the Waybill and/or S.E.D. . This field is currently used for US and PR origins only, as specified by UPS. Required if the SED_Code equals D or U and shipment origin is US or PR.
Attribute.Name: Line_License_Info

Attribute.Description: The expiry date for the validated export license, as indicated on the Waybill and/or S.E.D. If LINE_LICENSE_INFO is an exception, this is set to spaces.
Attribute.Name: Line_License_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: The detail description of the commodity in the invoice line, as indicated on the commercial/customs invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Merch_Desc1

Attribute.Description: Continuation of the detail description of the commodity in the invoice line, as indicated on the commercial/customs invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Merch_Desc2

Attribute.Description: Continuation of the detail description of the commodity in the invoice line, as indicated on the commercial/customs invoice.
Attribute.Name: Line_Merch_Desc3

Attribute.Description: The number found on Certificate Of Origin.
Attribute.Name: Cert_Of_Origin_No

Attribute.Description: The code representing the type of origin certification that applies to the commodity.
Attribute.Name: Cert_Of_Origin_Code

Attribute.Description: The types of trade agreements that are applicable for the commodities contained in the invoice line, as indicated on the commercial/customs invoice. EEC European Economic Community EFTA European Free Trade Agreement NAFTA North American Free Trade Agreement.
Attribute.Name: Agreement_Type

Attribute.Description: Commodity level remarks produced by the customer. Example: Commodity Level Declaration Statements.
Attribute.Name: Commodity_Remarks

Attribute.Description: The quantity of the commodity contained in the SED (Shipper's Export Declaration) line, as indicated in the SED document. This field is used for US and PR origins only, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Quantity_Schedule_Bunits

Attribute.Description: Any distinguishing marks or numbers that appear on the package. This field is valid only for US, PR, CA and VI shippers, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Marks_Numbers

Attribute.Description: The gross commodity weight for the SED and/or CO document. This field must be greater than zero if SED_CODE or COCODE in YCS_INTERNATIONAL_RECORD is not blank.
Attribute.Name: Commodity_Weight

Attribute.Description: The number of packages in the shipment containing this commodity. This field is currently used for US and PR origins, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Number_Of_Packages_Per_Cmmdty

Attribute.Description: The value of the SED Commodity contained on the SED. As per UPS specification, this field is currently used for US and PR origins only and this field must be greater than zero if SED_CODE in YCS_INTERNATIONAL_RECORD is not blank.
Attribute.Name: Sed_Line_Amt

Attribute.Description: The Certificate Of Origin Type. As per UPS specification, this field is currently used for US and PR origins only; if COCODE in YCS_INTERNATIONAL_RECORD is not blank, valid values are 1 ( Certificate of Origin), 2 (NAFTA Certificate of Origin); if COCODE is blank, this is set to space.
Attribute.Name: Co_Type

Attribute.Description: This indicates if SED is applicable.As per UPS specification, this field is currently used for US and PR origins only; if SED_CODE in YCS_INTERNATIONAL_RECORD is not blank, valid value is 1; else 0.
Attribute.Name: Sed_Ind

Attribute.Description: The value of the commodity in the invoice line, as indicated on the commercial invoice. This equals the LINE_UNIT_AMT_PRICE multiplied by the LINE_QUANTITY.
Attribute.Name: Line_Extended_Amt

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the freight charges.
Entity.Name: Freight_Charge

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Charge_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the carrier to which the package is manifested.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: Indicates the service to which package is manifested.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: Indicates the RE or CO.
Attribute.Name: Account_Type

Attribute.Description: Indicates the weight of the package.
Attribute.Name: Weight

Attribute.Description: The zone as given by the Carrier.
Attribute.Name: Zone

Attribute.Description: The basic charge specified by the Carrier.
Attribute.Name: Min_Charge

Attribute.Description: This field is used in basic charge computation.If MIN_CHARGE > (FACTOR_CHARGE * Weight) then MIN_CHARGE is considered as the basic charge. Else,(FACTOR_CHARGE * Weight) is considered as the basic charge.
Attribute.Name: Factor_Charge

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table is used to set some flags or to store certain mapped information. This table will have the values for those fields that are set to MAPPING in YCS_PLD_DETAIL table.
Entity.Name: General_Codes

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: General_Codes_Key

Attribute.Description: The Carrier Code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: This is usually the value that is sent in the XML to YCS in a particular field.In case of a flag, this will be the name of the flag.
Attribute.Name: Code

Attribute.Description: This is the value that is set for the mapped field which will be sent in the XML to FedEx server or UPS server or AirBorne server. In Case of a flag it will be Y/N.
Attribute.Name: Value

Attribute.Description: The field name in the XML sent to YCS.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: FK of YFS_Carrier_Adapter_Impl.. adaptor for which the mapping is being defined.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Adapter_Impl_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores UPS international shipper information.
Entity.Name: International_Record

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: International_Record_Key

Attribute.Description: This will have the MANIFEST_UPS_DTL_KEY of the shipper's carton record in YCS_MANIFEST_UPS_DTL table.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Number

Attribute.Description: The ship time stamp.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Date

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Waybill was produced for the shipment. As per UPS specification, valid values are 1 (Waybill was produced for shipment), default value is 0(No waybill used for shipment).
Attribute.Name: Waybill_Print_Ind

Attribute.Description: The value of the goods determined by shipper, as indicated on the waybill or commercial invoice.This is the sum of all LINE_EXTENDED_AMT in YCS_COMMODITY_RECORD table for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Line_Totals

Attribute.Description: The currency code used for INVOICE_LINE_TOTALS. This must conform to IATA/ISO country codes.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Currency_Code

Attribute.Description: The value for goods that is determined by shipper for insurance purpose.
Attribute.Name: Shipmentinsurancedeclaredvalue

Attribute.Description: The number of consignees in the consolidated clearance.
Attribute.Name: Consolidated_Clear_Qty

Attribute.Description: The country of ultimate destination, as indicated on the waybill or SED. As per UPS specification, this is required when an Ultimate Consignee address is completed on the S.E.D.
Attribute.Name: Ultimate_Dest_Country

Attribute.Description: This indicates if the Shipper's Export Declaration has been completed or not. As per UPS specification, this field is currently used for US and PR origins only; valid values are D(S.E.D. included with export documents), E(Electronically filed by the shipper pre-departure with an AES transaction number), P(Electronically filed by the shipper post-departure), U(UPS-prepared on the shipper's behalf), Y(S.E.D. exists but type unknown), space (Not applicable).
Attribute.Name: Sed_Code

Attribute.Description: As per UPS specification this field should be set to spaces.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Sed_Cas_Num

Attribute.Description: The invoice number as indicated on the invoice/waybill.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Number

Attribute.Description: The Purchase Order Number as indicated on invoice/waybill.
Attribute.Name: Po_Number

Attribute.Description: A general description of the goods contained in the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Description_Of_Goods

Attribute.Description: Shipper's comments or special instructions.
Attribute.Name: SpecialInstructions

Attribute.Description: If SED is applicable, it indicates whether shipper and consignee/importer are related or non-related.If not applicable, this is set to space. As per UPS specification, this is currently used for US and PR origins only; valid values are R(related), N(not related), space(not applicable).
Attribute.Name: Parties_To_Trans

Attribute.Description: Terms of delivery as indicated on the commercial invoice. As per UPS specification, valid values are CFR(Cost and Freight), CIF(Cost Insurance and Freight), CIP(Carriage and Insurance Paid), CPT(Carriage Paid To), DAF(Delivered At Frontier), DDP(Delivered Duty Paid), DDU(Delivered Duty Unpaid), DEQ(Delivered Ex Quay), DES(Delivered Ex Ship), EXW(Ex Works), FAS(Free Along Side), FCA(Free Carrier), FOB(Free on Board), Space(Not applicable).
Attribute.Name: Terms_Of_Shipment

Attribute.Description: Description of the payment terms.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Terms

Attribute.Description: The freight amount as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Freight_Charges

Attribute.Description: The Insurance Amount as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Insurance_Charges

Attribute.Description: Discount or Rebate amount as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Discount_Rebate

Attribute.Description: Sum of the other amounts being charged as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Other_Charges

Attribute.Description: The waybill/brokerage Identification Number.
Attribute.Name: Waybillnumber_BrokerageId

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if Certificate of Origin was completed or not, and the form it was on. As per UPS specification, this field is currently used for US and PR origins only; valid values are Space(No Certificate of Origin created), D(US Certificate of Origin created through shipping system and included with export documents), N(NAFTA Certificate of Origin created through shipping system and included with export documents, U(US Certificate of Origin prepared by UPS on shippers behalf).
Attribute.Name: Cocode

Attribute.Description: This indicates if any additional document is attached to the shipper. As per UPS specification, valid values are 0(no documents attached), 1(documents are attached), space(not applicable).
Attribute.Name: Other_Doc_Code

Attribute.Description: The reason the shipment is to be exported as indicated on the commercial invoice.
Attribute.Name: Reason_For_Export

Attribute.Description: This is the result of subtracting DISCOUNT_REBATE from INVOICE_LINE_TOTALS.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Sub_Total

Attribute.Description: The sum of INVOICE_LINE_TOTALS, DISCOUNT_REBATE, FREIGHT_CHARGES, INSURANCE_CHARGES and OTHER_CHARGES.
Attribute.Name: Total_Invoice_Amount

Attribute.Description: Identifies the broker for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Broker_Code

Attribute.Description: The destination control statement,as per UPS specification.
Attribute.Name: Destination_Control

Attribute.Description: The country code that identifies the country of origin for the commodities.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Commodity_Origin

Attribute.Description: A statement or statements from the shipper declaring certain facts or criteria to be true.
Attribute.Name: Declaration_Statement

Attribute.Description: Comments or remarks directed from the shipper to the consignee.
Attribute.Name: Additional_Comments

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores carton level information for UPS shipments.
Entity.Name: Manifest_Ups_Dtl

Attribute.Description: Preprinted control number or alternate control number provided by the shipper.
Attribute.Name: Cod_Control_Number

Attribute.Description: As per UPS specification, this field is required when CALL_TAG_ARSIND is 1; if shipper country is US or CA, this field uniquely identifies the package and for other shipper countries, this field holds the number of call tag packages in the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Call_Tag_Arsnumber

Attribute.Description: The Collect on Delivery Indicator-Indicates whether it is Non-COD(0) or standard COD(1) or Tagless COD(3).
Attribute.Name: COD_Ind

Attribute.Description: The currency code of the COD amount.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Cod_Currency_Code

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Incremental_Pld_Ind

Attribute.Description: Identifies the content-type of the shipment. As per UPS specification, valid values are 1(Letter), 2(Document), 3(non-document).
Attribute.Name: Doc_Ind

Attribute.Description: Shipper's Exporter Identification Number (Tax ID Number).
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Ein

Attribute.Description: The country code of the shipper.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Country

Attribute.Description: Name of the person at the shipping location who actually sent the package.
Attribute.Name: Sender_Name

Attribute.Description: Consignee's Tax Identification Number.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Taxid

Attribute.Description: The consignee's country.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Country

Attribute.Description: This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Calculated_Rates_Ind

Attribute.Description: The source of shipment data. As per UPS specification, valid values are 07(UPS EDI System), 20(UPS OnLine Host Access), 93(UPS OnLine Host Manifest Upload), 94(UPS OnLine Tools - Electronic).
Attribute.Name: Source_Type_Code

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Credit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Credit_Card_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether additional handling is needed. As per UPS specification, valid values are 0(no additional handling), 1(additional handling required).
Attribute.Name: Additional_Handling_Ind

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the deliver to address is within an extended destination area. As per UPS specification, valid values are 0(Not extended), 1(Extended).
Attribute.Name: Extended_Dest_Ind

Attribute.Description: Hazardous material indicator. As per UPS specification, if shipper country is US, PR or CA, the only valid value is 0(No hazardous material); for other shipper counties, valid values are 0(No hazardous material), 1(Hazardous material).
Attribute.Name: Haz_Mat

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the package is designated as hold for pickup. As per UPS specification, valid values are 0(no hold for pickup), 1(hold for pickup).
Attribute.Name: Hold_For_Pickup_Ind

Attribute.Description: Modification indicator. As per UPS specification, if shipper country is US, PR, CA or VI, valid values are 0(No modification), 1(service was provided); for other shipper countries, valid value is 0(No modification).
Attribute.Name: Modify_Ind

Attribute.Description: On Call air indicator. As per UPS specification, if shipper country is US, PR, CA, BE, DE, GB, HK, MX, NL or VI, valid values are 0(Standard), 1(On Call Air); for other shipper countries, valid value is 0(standard).
Attribute.Name: Oca_Indicator

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether package is processed or voided. Valid values are 0(package processed), 1(package voided).
Attribute.Name: Void_Ind

Attribute.Description: The package length.
Attribute.Name: Package_Length

Attribute.Description: The package width.
Attribute.Name: Package_Width

Attribute.Description: The package height.
Attribute.Name: Package_Height

Attribute.Description: Shipper's comments or special service instrucations.
Attribute.Name: Special_Instructions

Attribute.Description: The contact name if the package is designated for verbal confirmation.
Attribute.Name: Verbal_Confirmation_Name

Attribute.Description: The contact phone number if the package is designated for verbal confirmation.
Attribute.Name: Verbal_Confirmation_Phone

Attribute.Description: An alternate delivery time to be used if the UPS service related committed time is too early.
Attribute.Name: Earliest_Delivery_Time

Attribute.Description: The shipment credit card number if payment is made by credit card.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Credit_Card_Number

Attribute.Description: Shipment credit card expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Credit_Card_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: Shipper assigned ID for the consignee.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Number

Attribute.Description: Consignee Credit card number. This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Credit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: Consignee Credit Card Expiration date.This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Credit_Card_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: The UPS delivery confirmation number.
Attribute.Name: Dcis_Number

Attribute.Description: Consignee Fax destination Indicator. 0 indicates US, PR, CA or VI consignee fax number, 1 indicates non-US consignee fax number.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Fax_Destination_Ind

Attribute.Description: The consignee Fax number.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Fax

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Express_Cod_Tracking_Number

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field CUSTOMER_REFERENCE_NO3. As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No_Type3

Attribute.Description: Shipper identified package reference number.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No3

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field CUSTOMER_REFERENCE_NO4. As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP(Department Number), IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No_Type4

Attribute.Description: Shipper identified package reference number. As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP(Department Number), IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No4

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field CUSTOMER_REFERENCE_NO5.As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No_Type5

Attribute.Description: Shipper identified package reference number.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No5

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the address information is shipper third party billing address or consignee third party billing address or exporter address information.
Attribute.Name: Alternate_Party_Type

Attribute.Description: UPS account number of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Id_Acctnumber

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Pod_Reply_Type

Attribute.Description: Company name of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Company_Name

Attribute.Description: Contact name of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Attention

Attribute.Description: First Line of the address of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Address1

Attribute.Description: second line of the address of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Address2

Attribute.Description: Third line of the address of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Address3

Attribute.Description: The city of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: City

Attribute.Description: The state or province code of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Stateprov

Attribute.Description: The postal code of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: The country code of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Country

Attribute.Description: Telephone number of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Phone

Attribute.Description: The fax destination indicator. As per UPS specification, 0 indicates US, PR, CA and VI destination; 1 indicates non-US destination.
Attribute.Name: Fax_Destination_Ind

Attribute.Description: Fax number of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Fax

Attribute.Description: Language Code.This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Lang_Code

Attribute.Description: Credit card Number of the chosen alternate party type. This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: Credit card expiration date. This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: The Tax ID of the chosen alternate party type.
Attribute.Name: Tax_Id

Attribute.Description: This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Address_Type

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the notification request is at shipment level(S) or package level(P).
Attribute.Name: Advisory_Info_Level

Attribute.Description: The destination indicator for SN_FAX_NUMBER1. As per UPS specification, 0 indicates US, PR, CA or VI fax, 1 indicates fax of other counties.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Fax_Destination_Ind1

Attribute.Description: The fax number to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Fax_Number1

Attribute.Description: Language code. This is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Lang_Code1

Attribute.Description: Company Name1 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Company_Name1

Attribute.Description: Attention Name1 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Attn_Name1

Attribute.Description: Phone Number1 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Contact_Phone1

Attribute.Description: The destination indicator for SN_FAX_NUMBER2. As per UPS specification, 0 indicates US, PR, CA or VI fax, 1 indicates fax of other counties.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Fax_Destination_Ind2

Attribute.Description: Fax Number2 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Fax_Number2

Attribute.Description: Language Code.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Lang_Code2

Attribute.Description: Company Name2 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Company_Name2

Attribute.Description: Attention2 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Attn_Name2

Attribute.Description: Phone2 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Contact_Phone2

Attribute.Description: This field is set to space, as specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Alt_Profile_Access_Number

Attribute.Description: Indicates the ship notification type- 0(SN_Type_destination1 not used), 3(e-mail), 4(fax).
Attribute.Name: SN_Type_Destination1

Attribute.Description: The e-mail address1 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Email_Address_Destination1

Attribute.Description: Indicates the ship notification type-0(SN_Type_destination2 not used), 3(e-mail), 4(fax).
Attribute.Name: Sn_Type_Destination2

Attribute.Description: The e-mail address2 to be notified.
Attribute.Name: Sn_Email_Address_Destination2

Attribute.Description: The free-form message to be sent through mail or fax.
Attribute.Name: SN_Memo

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Ups_Dtl_Key

Attribute.Description: The Manifest Number to which the package is manifested.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Number

Attribute.Description: This will have the carton_no as value.
Attribute.Name: Ship_ID

Attribute.Description: The Carrier code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: Date the packages are to be picked by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Pickup_Date

Attribute.Description: Sender's UPS Account Number.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Account_Number

Attribute.Description: A 7 byte number expected by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Book_Number

Attribute.Description: A 3 byte number expected by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Page_Number

Attribute.Description: The shipment number to which the package belongs. During PLD Upload, this field corresponds to the lead package tracking number.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Number

Attribute.Description: The UPS tracking number.
Attribute.Name: Package_Tracking_Number

Attribute.Description: The Company name of the consignee for shipments.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Company_Name

Attribute.Description: The contact name at the consignee's address.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Attention

Attribute.Description: The first line of the consignee's address.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Address1

Attribute.Description: The second line of the consignee's address.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Address2

Attribute.Description: The third line of the consignee's address.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Address3

Attribute.Description: Consignee's city.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_City

Attribute.Description: State or Province code of the consignee.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Stateprov

Attribute.Description: The Consignee's postal code.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Postalcode

Attribute.Description: Consignee's Phone number.
Attribute.Name: Consignee_Phone

Attribute.Description: Billing type selected for the shipment.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Chg_Type

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether shipment is qualified for Hundred weight.
Attribute.Name: CWTInd

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service type code.
Attribute.Name: Ups_Service_Type

Attribute.Description: The type of packaging used for the package.
Attribute.Name: Packaging_Type

Attribute.Description: UPS Delivery Zone Code.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Zone

Attribute.Description: The actual weight of the package.
Attribute.Name: Package_Actual_Weight

Attribute.Description: The dimensional weight of the package.
Attribute.Name: Pkg_Published_Dim_Wt

Attribute.Description: Weight Unit Code.
Attribute.Name: Uom_Weight

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure used for package dimensions.
Attribute.Name: Uom_Dim

Attribute.Description: The amount to be collected from consignee.
Attribute.Name: Cod_Amount

Attribute.Description: The COD funds indicator.
Attribute.Name: Cod_Funds_Ind

Attribute.Description: The currency code.
Attribute.Name: Currency_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates the type of call tag.
Attribute.Name: Calltag_Arsind

Attribute.Description: As per UPS, this is used in conjunction with calltag.
Attribute.Name: Calltag_Arsschedulepickdate

Attribute.Description: Description of the overall package contents.
Attribute.Name: Merchandise_Description

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the shipment is designated as Saturday delivery.
Attribute.Name: Sat_Delivery_Ind

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the shipment is designated as Saturday pickup.
Attribute.Name: Saturday_Pickup_Ind

Attribute.Description: Indicates the size range of the package.
Attribute.Name: Oversize_Package_Ind

Attribute.Description: The value of the goods the shipper determines for insurance purpose.
Attribute.Name: Declared_Value_Insurance

Attribute.Description: Residence type indicator.
Attribute.Name: Res_Ind

Attribute.Description: Delivery Confirmation type code. As per UPS specification, valid values are 1(Name/Date), 2(Signature/Date), A(Adult Signature/Date).
Attribute.Name: DCIS_Type

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field CUSTOMER_REFERENCE_NO1.As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No_Type1

Attribute.Description: Shipper identified package reference number.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No1

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field CUSTOMER_REFERENCE_NO2.As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No_Type2

Attribute.Description: Shipper identified package reference number.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Reference_No2

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field SHIPMENT_REFERENCE_NO1.As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Reference_No1_Type

Attribute.Description: Shipment Reference Number1.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Reference_No1

Attribute.Description: Used by the shipper to identify the contents of the field SHIPMENT_REFERENCE_NO2.As specified by UPS, valid values are 3Q(Food and Drug Administration Product Code), PO(Purchase Order Number), ST(Store Number), DP Department Number, IK(Invoice Number), etc.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Reference_No2Type

Attribute.Description: Shipment Reference Number2.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Reference_No2

Attribute.Description: Specifies the actual manifest status of package: Y(Manifested)/P(Printed)/N(Not manifested)/Q(Printed and belonging to Shipment requiring shipment level integration). Value P would be used if just the Package label was printed. Value of N would be used for international packages when package is manifested by user on WMS but YCS saves this information before it calls the actual Carrier's system. When the last package of a shipment requiring shipment level integration is printed, the flag is set to P for all the packages of the shipment. See input_xml also for more details.
Attribute.Name: Manifested_Flag

Attribute.Description: This is used to save the input XML passed from WMS to YCS.
Attribute.Name: Input_Xml

Attribute.Description: See input_xml for details.
Attribute.Name: Output_Xml

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores UPS and FEDX manifest information.
Entity.Name: Manifest_Ups_Hdr

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Ups_Hdr_Key

Attribute.Description: The carrier code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The manifest number.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_Number

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the manifest is open 'O' or closed 'C' or uploaded 'U'.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The date the packages are to be picked up by the corresponding carrier.
Attribute.Name: Pickup_Date

Attribute.Description: Sender's UPS or FedEx account number.
Attribute.Name: Shipper_Account_Number

Attribute.Description: This field is used to derive Book Number and Page Number for UPS manifest.
Attribute.Name: PickUp_Summary_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores information related to UPS PLDUpload, FedEx 020,120,007,107,023,123 transactions and Airborne shipment request, reply and void transactions. This information is as per the specification given by the respective carrier.
Entity.Name: PLD_Detail

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Pld_Detail_Key

Attribute.Description: This is the adaptor key that is trying to find the mapping.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The transaction codes like 020, 120, 007,107,023,123 for FedEx, PLDUpload for UPS, GENERATE_SHIPMENT, GENERATE_SHIPMENT_RESPONSE, VOID_SHIPMENT for AirBorne.
Attribute.Name: Transaction

Attribute.Description: The sub-transactions like Request, Reply for AirBorne and FedEx, PackageLevelDetail, AlternatePartyRecord, InternationalRecord, CommodityRecord, etc for UPS.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Transaction

Attribute.Description: The field name in the input XML like ShipperAccountNumber, ConsigneeCompanyName, etc.
Attribute.Name: Field_Name

Attribute.Description: Starting byte position of the field.
Attribute.Name: Field_Location

Attribute.Description: The data type of the field.
Attribute.Name: Field_Type

Attribute.Description: Length of the field.
Attribute.Name: Field_Length

Attribute.Description: Indicates the number of bytes to the right of the decimal point in case of YCS_REAL datatype.
Attribute.Name: Decimal_Digits

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the field is Required (R) or Optional (O) or Conditional (C).
Attribute.Name: Required_Flag

Attribute.Description: This field can be set to blanks or 'SYSTEM' or 'MAPPING' or 'USER'. If set to blanks, value for the field is taken from the corresponding field in the input XML. If this is set to 'SYSTEM', value for the field is taken from DEFAULT_VALUE. If this is set to 'MAPPING', value is taken from YCS_GENERAL_CODES table. If this is set to 'USER', value is taken from YCS_PLD_USER_DEFAULTS table.
Attribute.Name: Default_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the default value to be considered when DEFAULT_TYPE is set to 'SYSTEM'.
Attribute.Name: Default_Value

Attribute.Description: This indicates the location of the field within the XML document.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Field_Name

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores user defined default values for fields in YCS_PLD_DETAIL table.
Entity.Name: PLD_User_Defaults

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Pld_User_Defaults_Key

Attribute.Description: The Carrier Code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The transaction codes like 020, 120, 007,107,023,123 for FedEx, PLDUpload for UPS, GENERATE_SHIPMENT, GENERATE_SHIPMENT_RESPONSE, VOID_SHIPMENT for AirBorne.
Attribute.Name: Transaction

Attribute.Description: The field name in the input XML like ShipperAccountNumber, ConsigneeCompanyName, etc.
Attribute.Name: Field_Name

Attribute.Description: This indicates the default value for the input XML field when the DEFAULT_TYPE is set to 'USER' in YCS_PLD_DETAIL table.
Attribute.Name: Default_Value

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table is referred to get the extra charges for special services while computing freight charge for UPS package.
Entity.Name: Surcharges

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Surcharges_Key

Attribute.Description: The Carrier code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service type code.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: The UPS Special Service.
Attribute.Name: Surcharge_Name

Attribute.Description: The standard charge for the special service as published by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Std_Charge

Attribute.Description: The factor charge for the special service, as published by UPS. If FACTOR_CHARGE_ON is weight, then Extra Charge = STD_CHARGE + FACTOR_CHARGE * PackageWeight. If FACTOR_CHARGE_ON is charge, then Extra Charge = STD_CHARGE + FACTOR_CHARGE * Basic charge.
Attribute.Name: Factor_Charge

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the FACTOR_CHARGE has to be applied on package weight or basic charge. This is specified by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Factor_Charge_On

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the UPS published zip codes for which surcharges are applicable.
Entity.Name: Surcharge_Applicable

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Surcharge_Applicable_Key

Attribute.Description: The carrier code.
Attribute.Name: Carrier

Attribute.Description: The UPS Service type code.
Attribute.Name: Service

Attribute.Description: Identifies whether the shipping address is residential or commercial.
Attribute.Name: Account_Type

Attribute.Description: UPS provides destination postal codes as a range of postal codes. The lower value in the range goes here.
Attribute.Name: Dest_From_Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: UPS provides destination postal codes as a range of postal codes. The higher value in the range goes here.
Attribute.Name: Dest_To_Postal_Code

Attribute.Description: The destination country code.
Attribute.Name: Dest_Country

Attribute.Description: THe UPS Special Service.
Attribute.Name: Surcharge_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the UPS routing code (URC) corresponding to the destination of the package and postal code. This data is used to indicate the destination to which the cartons are shipped. This helps UPS in tracking and routing the packages quickly and efficiently.
Entity.Name: UPS_Routing_Code

Attribute.Description: Primary Key Attribute.
Attribute.Name: Ups_Routing_Code_Key

Attribute.Description: The country to which cartons are shipped.
Attribute.Name: Country_Code

Attribute.Description: Zip code to which cartons are shipped.
Attribute.Name: Zip_Code

Attribute.Description: The UPS Routing Code published by UPS.
Attribute.Name: Urc

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
